tool_description: The Text Sentiment API on RapidAPI is one of the fastest and most robust sentiment analysis APIs. It returns values of POSITIVE, NEGATIVE, NEUTRAL, or MIXED and the associated probabilities (confidence) that a text has these sentiments. You can read more about the APi in this blog post: https://jj-espinoza-la.medium.com/the-benefits-and-uses-of-sentiment-analysis-apis-810de5f40fce
name: Text Sentiment API
title: Text Sentiment API

api_list.name: sentiment
api_list.description: This endpoint returns the sentiment of a given text.

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.default: Negative is greater than the sum of its flawed parts.
